thread.section_title: FlightHub Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of FlightHub | flighthub.com | 4 of 1735
thread.title: Meseret A.

author: Meseret A.
title: Meseret A.
text:
Seriously. Flighthub is a total gem! It's definitely a best friend to students w/ severe cases of wanderlust. I love to travel, but being a student, budgeting is crucial. Flighthub has the lowest rates than any other service (at least those I've compared it to), plus if you put an alert on a fare, Flighthub emails you whenever the prices drop and/or when they find deals for your trip.
I'm definitely impressed w/ Flighthub so far. I truly hope it doesn't disappoint.
